conference.name: Qiskit Fall Fest RGUKT 2025
conference.theme: Quantum India: Bridging Theory to Reality

sessions.title: Inaugural Ceremony
sessions.description: Formal inauguration of Qiskit Fall Fest RGUKT 2025 with welcome address and keynotes.

sessions.title: Opening Keynote
sessions.description: Opening remarks from IBM Quantum India Lead on the roadmap of Quantum India.
speakers: Dr. L. Venkata Subramaniam – IBM Quantum India Lead

sessions.title: Guest Speaker Session
sessions.description: Talk by Robert Loredo on quantum education and innovation strategies.
speakers: Robert Loredo – CEO / Founder, Entangled Solutions Group

sessions.title: Guest Lecture
sessions.description: Project managers and Qiskit programmers will work together on the next decade of quantum projects.
speakers: Gregory Skulmoski – Associate Professor, Faculty of Society & Design, Bond University

sessions.title: Guest Lecture
sessions.description: Insights into IBM Quantum research and development.
speakers: Dr. Ritajit Majumdar – Research Scientist, IBM Quantum

sessions.title: Guest Lecture
sessions.description: Session on cryptography and quantum security foundations.
speakers: Dr. Goutam Paul – Professor, ISI Kolkata

sessions.title: Day-1 Workshop: Hands-on Qiskit
sessions.description: Practical, hands-on workshop on Qiskit and IBM Quantum Lab.
speakers: Dr. Jnan Yalla – CTO, DataTeach AI; Ex R&D Scientist, DRDO

sessions.title: Guest Speaker
sessions.description: Qiskit 1 vs 1 discussion and live coding demo.
speakers: Janani A – IBM Quantum Support

sessions.title: Guest Lecture
sessions.description: Quantum Agentic AI via Qiskit in Healthcare.
speakers: Sreenivasa Pisupati – Quantum Specialist & Advisor, AI Delivery & Architect

sessions.title: Guest Lecture
sessions.description: Discussion on quantum startups and innovation.
speakers: Mr. Nixon Patel – Founder & CEO, Qulabz

sessions.title: Day-2 Workshop: Hands-on Qiskit
sessions.description: Interactive session on quantum circuits using Qiskit.
speakers: Dr. Jnan Yalla – CTO, DataTeach AI

sessions.title: Guest Speaker
sessions.description: Quantum Machine Learning & Applications.
speakers: Prof. Elias F. Combarro – Associate Professor, University of Oviedo, Spain

sessions.title: Guest Speaker
sessions.description: Quantum Algorithms (Basics to Advanced).
speakers: Soumya Ranjan Swain – IBM Quantum Ambassador

sessions.title: Guest Lecture
sessions.description: Quantum Computing Engineering insights.
speakers: Tilock Sadhukhan – Quantum Computing Engineer, CDAC Bangalore

sessions.title: Guest Lecture
sessions.description: Recent research updates from IBM Quantum.
speakers: Col. Sai – IBM Quantum Research Scientist

sessions.title: Day-3 Workshop: Hands-on Qiskit
sessions.description: Advanced Qiskit workshop by Dr. Jnan Yalla.
speakers: Dr. Jnan Yalla – CTO, DataTeach AI; Ex R&D Scientist, DRDO

sessions.title: Workshop: QSim Hands-on Demonstration
sessions.description: Demonstration of indigenous Quantum Computer Simulator Toolkit (QSim).
speakers: Abijeeth Teja – CDAC Hyderabad

sessions.title: Guest Lecture
sessions.description: AI and Robotics perspectives on Quantum applications.
speakers: Dr. Srikanth Thudumu – Director, Institute of Applied Artificial Intelligence and Robotics (IAAIR)

sessions.title: Guest Lecture
sessions.description: Introduction to Qiskit advocacy and hackathon mentoring.
speakers: Dr. Swathi Mummadi – IBM Quantum Qiskit Advocate, Associate Professor, BVRIT

sessions.title: 48-Hour Hackathon
sessions.description: 48-hour hackathon sprint: team-based project building and testing with mentor guidance.
speakers: Dr. Swathi Mummadi – IBM Quantum Qiskit Advocate, BVRIT

sessions.title: 48-Hour Hackathon (Continued)
sessions.description: Ongoing hackathon development and mentor checkpoints.

sessions.title: Guest Speaker
sessions.description: Quantum Optimization techniques and QML.
speakers: Mr. Rahul Rana – TCS Research Scientist

sessions.title: Guest Speaker
sessions.description: We don’t need to be physicists or mathematicians to start in Quantum Machine Learning.
speakers: Frank C. Zickert PhD – Quantum Algorithm Engineer & Trainer

sessions.title: Hackathon Finale & Judging
sessions.description: Final project presentations, judging, and evaluations.

sessions.title: Valedictory Ceremony
sessions.description: Closing remarks, awards, and feedback session.
